briefTitle: Atrovastatin for Preventing Atrial Fibrillation Following Open Cardiac Valve Repair
summary: The purpose of the investigation is to determine whether Atrovastatin as anti-inflammatory agent can be effective in preventing from atrial fibrillation incidence in patients whom undergone open cardiac surgery for their heart valve repair.

primaryOutcome.measure: Atrial Fibrillation Incidence After Open Cardiac Valve Repair
primaryOutcome.timeFrame: Within 5 days after open cardiac valve repair
